enums.name: simple_rounding_strategy
enums.description: Represents a rounding strategy for calculating prices in a given currency when the fractional part of an intermediate value has precision greater than the number of decimals used by that currency.

values.name: currency_precision
values.description: Intermediate values are rounding to the given currency's precision using HALF_UP rounding. For example, $12.344 USD is rounded to $12.34, while $12.345 USD is rounded to $12.35.

enums.name: subscription_frequency
enums.description: defines the subscription periods we offer

models.name: onboarding_task
models.description: Represents a single onboarding-related task on a checklist to start using Flow. These are created asynchronously in the background based on onboarding settings and experiences upserted. fields.description: Fees applicable for this estimate

fields.description: Total of the amount plus any applicable fees

fields.name: dimensional_weight
fields.description: Estimated dimensional weight (i.e. length x width x depth / dim factor) based on dimensions provided to estimates endpoint or organization dimension estimates. Provided for transparency and any future troubleshooting.

fields.name: gravitational_weight
fields.description: Estimated gravitational weight (i.e. actual weight) based on dimensions provided to estimates endpoint or organization weight estimates. Provided for transparency and any future troubleshooting.

resources.description: Represents a summary of a cost estimate based on rate card data for an origin/destination and weight, either gravitational or dimensional

operations.description: Endpoint to get shipment cost estimates based on applicable rate cards. An origin and destination address must be provided. Final amounts are based on either gravitational weight or dimensional weight. When estimating based off gravitational weight, the weight field must be set. When estimating based off dimensional weight, then length/width/depth must be set. For either one, the appropriate unit of measurement must be given.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Refers to your organization's account identifier

responses.description: One or more errors were found with the data sent in the request. The body of the response contains specific details on what data failed validation.
